TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Saudi_Arabia, title = Saudi_Arabia, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saudi_Arabia} }

S.FORM: Saudi arabia u Saudi Arabia sa i labu nu Asia, itiza i 25 00 N, 45 00 E. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 2,149,690 km2. u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 2,149,690 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 0 km2. hamin nu tademaw sa 28,160,273. kakalukan umah sa 80.70 , kilakilangan umah sa 0.50 , zumaay henay umah sa 18.80 . tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Riyadh . kakinginan nu kanatal demiad kakinging nu kanatal demiad sa 23 bulad 9 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Salman of Saudi Arabia, micakat a demiad sa i 2015 a mihca cacay bulad tusa bataan izaw ku tulu demiad. cunli u cunli nu Saudi Arab ayza sa ci Mohammed bin Salman , micakat a demiad sa i 2017 a mihcaan 6 bulad 21 demiad. likisi 1750 . Saudi Arab kalingatuwan i cacay a malebud pitu a lasubu lima a bataan (1750) a mihcaan Arab pan daw nu teban a niyaduan, nu Muhan mude. pen .sauti ( . . ) a kuowan atu Ese lan misumaday a tademaw ci Muhan mude. a putula waha pu ( . ) mapulung palekal tu baluhay a kawaw. 150 , . nikudan satu nu cacay a lasubu lima a bataan (150), Saudi Arab nu lumaan sawni kapah sawni laecus, mangalay miyala tu pankiw a subalan mikuwan sisa caay pisengal atu Egypt , E'tumadikuo a kanatal mamasuadan, kinatusa henay maalaw ku sapikuwan a kawaw. . aydaay a Saudi Arab u Kuowa Apudule.Acice.Pen.Apudule.Lhe'man.Alesaudi ( . . . . . ) ku patideng. 1902 . cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu idaw ku tusa (1920) a mihcaan ci Apudule.Acice ( . ) mililit tu tademaw makayda i luman mihinang i Kewiyte a malingad. namakayda i Laside a lalumaan mialaw tu Liyade . 1913 1926 . itini i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku tulu (1913) a malebud katukuh i cacay a malebut siwaw a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku enem a mihcaan, Apudule.Acice ( . ) malecad kunipidebung tu Naice (nacide ) atu Hance (Siciwce ) tusa a lala. 1926 1 8 . cacay a malebud siwaw a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku enem (1926) a mihcaan cacay a bulad walu a demiad, Apudule.Acice ( . ) mala mikuwawnay tu kakitidaan a kuowan. 1927 5 20 . cacay a malebud siwaw a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku pitu (1927) a mihcaan lima a bulad tusa a bataan a demiad masasulit kunuheni tu citatiaei sisa Saudi Arab malingatu tu miales tu Ingkuo misideketu kunuheni. 1932 9 22 . cacay a malebud siwaw a lasubu tulu a bataan idaw ku tusa (1932) a mihcaan siwa a bulad tusa a bataan idaw ku tusa a demiad Saudi Arab mihaneng mihapu tu malecad tu kitasa. 1938 3 3 . cacay a malebud siwaw a lasubu tulu a bataan idaw ku walu (1938) a mihcaan itini i Saudi Arab isasa nu lala makaadih tu simal hidasatu masumad ku cence nuheni. cen ce . 1992 . Saudi Arab u cen ciw malecad a cuncu nu saudiihay a kanatal. u aydaay nu miliwanay tu cuncu atekak nu kawaw nu kanatal a adidiay a kuowan idaw henay ku sapikuwanay tu kawaw a kanatal, cacay a malebud siwaw a lasubu siwaw a bataan idaw ku tusa (1992) a mihcaan mlingatu sikawaw tu "ahican ku kanatal a midayumsa " palucekan, Saudi Arab naw ci Apu tule aci ce ( . ) a laylay nu utiihay mikuwanay tu kanatal, u "Kulan cin " u satalakaway nu sian fa . . . kanatal sakamusa Saliyafa a kawaw. Saudi Arab mahiya nu lihalay a lalumaan u "sacaaya ka lihalaya" a kanatal sa. 2005 . Saudi Arab a kanatal nu labu inay ku matatungusay a centan, katukuh ayda tusa a malebut idaw ku lima (2005) a mihcaan kinacacay henay amisikiw, misingkiwa sa u tatama acacay ku tanengay misingkiw. . nakamusa, kuowan a sapikuwan malalit nu Iselamciw fa atu duma nu Saudi a laylay nu nipikuwan. , . anu idaw ku tabakiay nu sapidateng a kawaw sa kuowan amitatengil henay tu duma a nudu Wanse a tademaw, kiwkay nu sakakaay ci Wulima atu nudumaan nu Saudi usiidaay kangadahan nu tademaw. . Sunni pay iluc a Waha pipay a kanatala nu nipabeli a tapang nu sasadimelay nu kawaw. . nina Ise lanciw pay silahci itini i kanatal patideng tu cincen se' atu islanciw a cacudadan pasayda i kanatal micuduh tu nuudip a cacudadan. . katukuh ayda, Saudi Arab mahini tu caay kahida nu aydaay a kanatal nu matatungusa a naike, satalakaway atu sapisingkiwan a kawaw. aaidangan a kawaw , , 5 . Saudi Arab idaw ku ahebalay nu likelikenan, langdaw nu buyu' atu bayubayuwan, matatungusay a lalangaw atu likisi nu nababalaki, ilabu nu kanatal han idaw ku lima a kitakit nu liwan namaka babalakiay, nika micidekay nu caay ka lawlaw nu balucu a Muselin kanatal , nu sakay taydaay nu midangay a tademaw nuni ka sasakamuen hiyan tu nu Pawsupay atu sakakaay amipenec. . mangalay miales tu nipiida' tu simal, pasayda i sakaudip nu yadahay a sasacelakan, Saudi Arab yadah kunipi patahekal tu kalisiw sapisumad tu nipatideng tu kakitidaan atu misanga tu baluhay a aaidangan. 2019 9 27 49 . tusa a malebud cacay a bataan idaw ku siwaw a mihcaan siwa a bulad tusa a bataan idaw ku pitu a demiad, Saudi Arab mihapu sa patahkal tu aaidangan, sayaway malingatu patahekal tu sasaliwkuan a cudad sipabeli i sepatay a bataan idaw ku siwa a kanatalan. . nudamaay a kanatal nu tatayna taneng a sacacay sa tayni midang, acaay kasi tanayuay nu lumeniay a dikuc, nika u taydaay amidang nu tademaw kanca a kapah kuni kasidikucan atu kasikadi ku itidaay a tademaw nunikacaay kan tu pah. Saudi Arab kiwkay . 85 90 10 15 . hulic anipatideng nuitidaay a tademaw awu Muselin . a walu a bataan idaw ku lima (85) siwa a bataan a kilac (90 ) u Saudi a tademaw u Cennipay , u Seyapay muselin a tademaw han i cacay a bataan (10) cacay a bataan idaw ku lima (15 ) a kilac. 18 , . talakaway a tademaw atu mikuwanay tu kawaw a Sunni pay Muselin itini i Saudi Arab sananay a ngangan a Waha piciwpay , nu aydaay a Islanciw nu malumanay a cuipay, itini i caca a bataan idaw ku walu a se ci Arabia subal nu Muhanmuode.epen.apudule wawhapi ( . . ) nipatideng, hiyahan musakamu nu Islam nuudip a kawaw "cinciw tuse , "caay pisulul" atu "sakadimel". 7 . . pacukeday a tademaw hidasa u sakapahen ku kawaw, duma nunipsa baluhay atu sakakawawen pasaicuwaay hakiya mibatad tu pitu a seci Islamkiw a tademaw Muhanmuode atu masakaputay nuheni a nicudadan. nu caaya kahacica a Seyapay misaayaw tu kakakuliyan atu kiwkay anipi sawacu. . . Saudi Arab u cenciw kapulungan nu kanatal. Islamkiw tada micidekay nu Pawsupay Wahapipay u tada kiwkay sa, Saudi Arab sakay nutawan a kawaw itini i kitakit patahkal tu ngiha' nu Wawhapi a singku nu kasaetiman. malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan CIA List of current heads of state and government :https: zh.wikipedia.org wiki E6 B2 99 E7 89 B9 E9 98 BF E6 8B 89 E4 BC AF
